item.title: Service of Love
item.description: Why doing service is important to you? How does the seva improve you as a person as a spiritual aspirant-as a guru? Well, I donâ€™t know that seva means performing without expecting a reward, or a result of an outcome. Little I know that Seva is a powerful tool to learn about myself, be it inner or outer. I was doing it for my grandmother, father, mom, siblings, and my school teachers continuously since I was a little girl.
